name: Final Hexam
description:
Your Final Hexam stands between you and being a master Wizard or Witch, but as lazy as you were, you didnt even bother to learn for it. Now you're thrown into the school and need to find letters to even have a chance to pass the test.

Code by Fuchsilein(Foxy#9328),   Art by Sen#1629, Sound and Level Design by Coin#9162
